description: addClientTicketComment stores metadata.responseSource=client_portal on newly inserted comment
createCommentFromEmail stores metadata.responseSource=inbound_email on newly inserted comment
Inbound email comment metadata includes provider type when inboundReplyEvent/provider is available
IComment typing accepts metadata without breaking existing comment consumers
Response source utility returns inbound_email when latest eligible comment has metadata.responseSource=inbound_email
Response source utility returns client_portal when latest eligible comment has metadata.responseSource=client_portal
Response source utility ignores internal comments when determining latest customer response source
Fallback logic returns inbound_email when metadata.email exists but metadata.responseSource is absent
Fallback logic returns client_portal for legacy client comment with user_id when metadata.responseSource is absent
Fallback logic returns null when no eligible customer response comment exists
MSP TicketDetails renders 'Received via Client Portal' when derived source is client_portal
MSP TicketDetails renders 'Received via Inbound Email' when derived source is inbound_email
Client Portal TicketDetails renders source indicator for client_portal responses
Client Portal TicketDetails renders source indicator for inbound_email responses
Both TicketDetails screens hide source indicator when source is unresolved
No database migration is required and existing comment rows remain valid
Google inbound email flow produces comments that resolve to inbound_email source in ticket details
Microsoft inbound email flow produces comments that resolve to inbound_email source in ticket details
IMAP inbound email flow (shared email processing path) produces comments that resolve to inbound_email source
Response state transitions remain unchanged after adding source metadata (client-visible response still sets awaiting_internal)
Response source indicator updates after posting a new client portal comment without requiring full page reload
Response source indicator updates after inbound email reply is ingested and comments are refreshed
Locale keys for response source labels resolve correctly in English and do not break existing ticket detail translations
Legacy ticket with mixed comments chooses latest eligible customer response source correctly
